title: I'm speaking for the whole LoL community , nerf pyke and nerf damage
body:
Pyke is literally the most unfair champion design on the game. U can't punish him , he deals shit load of dmg and when u hit him he just run away and heals all of it. Completely remove his healing


Then there is damage. It's out of control , everyone dies so freaking fast. Who one shots faster 


In Regards

5.000.000 League of Legends Players

replies.body:
You don't speak for us. 
You have 1 upvote in 2 hours. You should have realised and deleted this post.

> [{quoted}](name=Saezio,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=60UBeBPR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-05-31T10:05:23.362+0000)
>
> You don't speak for us. 
> You have 1 upvote in 2 hours. You should have realised and deleted this post.

every post starts with 1 upvote
I did mean except for that

What damage? He only does damage in he early game and it's not even oppressive levels. Also maybe try ccing him? Or damage him constantly. 

You saying he can just heal all of it HE CAN'T it's fucking impossible like actually impossible LATE GAME HE CAN HEAL 65% OF HIS HP. If you know nothing about a champion DON'T complain about him.
Some dogs hate pyke because some dogs can smell cancer.
You can barely speak for yourself so don't pretend to speak for anyone else. I liked the joke tho
lmao i live facing pyke because its easy to dodge his skillshots and he gets 2 shot, you do not speak for everyone
